column1: ### Hammett acidity function for some super acid systems. I. Systems H2SO4-SO3
### Journal of the American Chemical Society 1971 93 (20)
### The values below were taken from the Ph.D. Thesis of Terence Peel at McMaster University

column2: Terence Edward. The Hammett Acidity Function for Some Superacid Media.

column1: ### 98.5% is strongest commercially available sulphuric acid
### 100% is enough added SO3 to get to electrochemical definition of 100%
### % conc is 100% + 18/80*%oleum (oleum is excess SO3 expressed as the mass of H2O.SO3) (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Oleum)
